content: रोधः [रुध्-घञ्] {@--1@} Stopping, arresting, hindering; <ls>Śi. 10. 89.</ls> {@--2@} Obstruction, stoppage, hindrance, prevention, prohibition, suppression; शापादसि प्रतिहता स्मृतिरोधरूक्षे <ls>Ś. 7. 32</ls>; उपलरोध <ls>Ki. 5. 15</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 220.</ls> {@--3@} Closing, shutting up, blocking up, blockade, siege; प्रीतिरोधमसहिष्ट सा पुरी <ls>R. 11. 52.</ls> {@--4@} A dam, bank. {@--5@} Sprouting, growing.
